overview:
President on the Board of Directors of MediaTrust. MediaTrust an innovative award-winning leader in the interactive performance marketing industry â€œConnecting Quality Clicks to Conversionsâ€. MediaTrust makes online direct response advertising effective & efficient for advertisers, agencies, publisher and affiliate marketers by connecting quality clicks to conversions with the innovative PerformanceExchange. PerformanceExchange connects advertisers with customers in real-time via our proprietary CPC bidding and customer delivery system.

MediaTrust makes pay-for-results online advertising easier. MediaTrust offers an innovative online technology platform, supported by best-in-class service, and access to the best direct response advertisers and affiliate publishers in the industry. MediaTrust enables affiliate marketers, publishers & advertisers to easily create and deploy pay-for-performance marketing CPA, CPL, CPC ,Revshare campaigns that deliver leads and sales.

The company was recently named the 9th fastest growing US company in 2009 & 2010 by Inc. 500 , and #1 Performance Marketing Network 2009 by Revenue Performance Magazine

Founded in 2004, MediaTrust is headquartered in New York City with offices in Los Angeles and Santa Barbara.
